post.body: Moving really does suck, I hope I don't have to do it again too many times! We're in Modbury, v. close to work for me!
Wow, congrats to you too! :) It's good out of home, but I'll be happier once I'm done sorting through all these boxes! ...
Are you still in Adelaide? Last I heard, you were moving to Perth!
Me too, really well! Tim and I are engaged and we moved out a couple of weeks ago. :)
Hi... how are you going these days?
I got your Christmas post card today - so cuuute! I will have to send you something. :)
I'm watching the second series. Probably Carrie. :)
Going to sleep while Tim reads next to me. What a role reversal! G'night xox
Just got out of the shower. Going to let my hair dry naturally while I help Tim tidy up.
I have sand in my eyes :(
I'm covered in sand.
Eating my lunch. I'm sick of work.
Going to work, it's a nice day outside. Wishing I didn't have to spend nice days inside.
Just got up after a little sleep-in. Making coffee now.
Just joined a gym. Let's hope I make more use of this membership than my last one!
Drinking a banana smoothie that Tim made for me before he left for work. I'm soooo tired! :(
Going to Mum & Dad's house. I have to pay some bills!
Yay, Tim's home!
Eating too much chocolate and watching Sex & the City.
Feeling very alone and unhappy right now.
